column4: CANT SOMEONE JUST ASWERE THIS QUETION!? HOW DO I GET PASSED THE "PREPARING TO INSTALL" WINDOW!?!?
You have been asked many times to stop using caps lock. This is your last warning.
Can you post a screenshot of where the install is hanging?
Here it is, but for some reason the image didnt pick up the loading curser =/ w/e:       http://imagebin.org/131025
Here it is, but for some reason the image didnt pick up the loading curser =/ w/e:       http://imagebin.org/131025
I saw it the first (and second) time.
How much RAM do you have?
I have 2GB of Ram
I have 2GB of Ram
Again, I saw the first time.
why dont you answer back...
Because I don't know why it's hanging there.
YOU ASKED ME HOW MUCH RAM I HAD I THought?
Is there a problem with your caps lock key?
Keep on pressing my accident =/
You might want to disable the caps lock key completely. At the very least please look at your responses before hitting enter so that you can catch that you had caps lock on and fix it.
can you keep helping me?
I don't have any ideas currently.
Like others have suggested, the alternate install CD will probably work for you.
when i use the other CD, does it come with all the stuff?
that it would come with with the normal CD?
Yes. The resulting install is identical.
